# /  A tour of Flutter

|  |  |  |  |
|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|
|UI/UX| Flutter Widget of the Week | Widget, ,! | [](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOU2XLYxmsIL0pH0zWe_ZOHgGhZ7UasUE) |
||Darts Flutter Framework Study|,(BottomNavigationBar)  |[](https://steemit.com/utopian-io/@tensor/persisting-user-interface-state-and-building-bottom-navigation-bars-in-dart-s-flutter-framework)|



##  Dart
- [Sample Code | Dart](https://www.dartlang.org/samples)
- [Effective Dart | Dart](https://www.dartlang.org/guides/language/effective-dart)
- [Library Tour | Dart](https://www.dartlang.org/guides/libraries/library-tour)
- [konieshadow/dart-tour: Dart](https://github.com/konieshadow/dart-tour)


## & Guide


### Widget/UI InputWidget
- [Flutter -  - CSDN](https://blog.csdn.net/yumi0629/article/details/81870615)


###  Asynchronous : Future & async/await
- [[ Future async/await\] dart - Getting values from Future instances - Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46579358/getting-values-from-future-instances)


### JSON JSON Serialization
- [[\] Flutter  JSON - ](https://juejin.im/post/5b5d782ae51d45191c7e7fb3)


### & File I/O
- [Reading and Writing Files - Flutter](https://flutter.io/docs/cookbook/persistence/reading-writing-files)
- [Flutter:sqflite - Android - ](https://juejin.im/entry/5b1e2451f265da6e26099ad7)
- [Flutter | Flutter](http://flutter.link/2018/04/13/Flutter%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%B0%E5%AD%98%E5%82%A8/)
	-  Route/Navigator/...
	- [Flutter | Flutter](http://flutter.link/2018/04/02/Flutter%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E8%B7%AF%E7%94%B1%E8%B7%B3%E8%BD%AC/)


###  Others
- [[\] Executing Dart in the Background with Flutter Plugins and Geofencing](https://medium.com/flutter-io/executing-dart-in-the-background-with-flutter-plugins-and-geofencing-2b3e40a1a124)


##  DevToolsChain
- [Flutter Beta 3  - Android - ](https://juejin.im/entry/5af3887b6fb9a07ace58df5e)


##  Useful Plugin/Package 


### / Local Storage/Data Persistence
- [shared_preferences | Flutter Package](https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/shared_preferences)
- [sqflite | Flutter Package](https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/sqflite)


###  State Management
- [flutter_redux | Flutter Package](https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/flutter_redux)


###  Native Interaction
- [url_launcher | Flutter Package](https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/url_launcher#-readme-tab-)
- [flutter_webview_plugin | Flutter Package](https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/flutter_webview_plugin)


###  Others
- (Flutter)[dartson | Dart Package](https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/dartson#-readme-tab-)


##  Git Repository
- [zhujian1989/flutter_study: flutter](https://github.com/zhujian1989/flutter_study)
- [GSYGithubAppFlutter/main.dart at master  CarGuo/GSYGithubAppFlutter](https://github.com/CarGuo/GSYGithubAppFlutter/blob/master/lib/main.dart)
- [brianegan/flutter_architecture_samples: TodoMVC for Flutter](https://github.com/brianegan/flutter_architecture_samples)
- [flutter_architecture_samples](https://github.com/brianegan/flutter_architecture_samples)
- [ice1000/code_wars_android: A mobile client for CodeWars](https://github.com/ice1000/code_wars_android)


##  Study Reference

- [Fltr::Dart1.x](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxU9Ryxq6p58PsNmJL70J4_7UzfSqf35n)

- [Google Codelabs](https://codelabs.developers.google.com/?cat=Flutter)

- [flutter simple samples](https://github.com/flutter/samples/blob/master/INDEX.md)
- [Flutter ](https://flutter-io.cn/)

- [Flutter](https://flutterchina.club/)
- [Testing Flutter Apps - Flutter](https://flutter.io/testing/)
- [Flutter](http://flutter.link/)
- [FAQ - Flutter](https://flutter.io/faq/)
- [Flutter  - ](https://juejin.im/post/5bab35ff5188255c3272c228?utm_source=gold_browser_extension)
- [Flutter - ](https://juejin.im/post/5bac9b1de51d450e452ac1c7?utm_source=gold_browser_extension)
- [Language Tour | Dart](https://www.dartlang.org/guides/language/language-tour)
- [Newest 'flutter' Questions - Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/flutter)

## / Assets/Design Tools 
- [Gallery](https://gallery.io/)

##  Some Problems
- ()
- [flutter_gallery_assets cannot use alternate storage locations  Issue #13763  flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/13763)
- [Android App Gradle key.properties ()](https://github.com/konifar/droidkaigi2018-flutter/issues/64)
- [Using Flutter in China  flutter/flutter Wiki](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/wiki/Using-Flutter-in-China)


# :


## BottomNavigation(),


### 
- **** : [PageStorageKey](https://docs.flutter.io/flutter/widgets/PageStorageKey-class.html), [PageStorageBucket](https://docs.flutter.io/flutter/widgets/PageStorageBucket-class.html)

- **** :
  -  [flutter_presistance_bottom_nav_tutorial](https://github.com/tensor-programming/flutter_presistance_bottom_nav_tutorial/blob/master/lib/main.dart)

- **** : 
```dart
  final PageStorageBucket bucket = PageStorageBucket();
  //...
  return Scaffold(
  body: PageStorage(
    child: currentPage,
    bucket: bucket,
  ),
  //...
  PageStorage.of(context).writeState(context, b,
    identifier: ValueKey(
      '${widget.dataList[index].id}',
    ));
```

- **** :  `StatefulWidget` , `StatelessWidget` WidgetWidget, `Key` super(key:key),
```dart

class MyWidgetOrPage extend StatelessWidget{
    MyWidgetOrPage(Key key, {...}):super(Key:key);
    //...
}

class MyWidgetOrPage extend StatefulWidget{
    MyWidgetOrPage(Key key, {...}):super(Key:key);
    //...
}

//...
```


### 
- **** : [AutomaticKeepAliveClientMixin](https://docs.flutter.io/flutter/widgets/AutomaticKeepAliveClientMixin-mixin.html)
- ****
  -  [flutter_bottomnavigationbar](https://github.com/OpenFlutter/Flutter-Notebook/tree/master/mecury_project/example/flutter_bottomnavigationbar)


### 
- ****
  - [StackOverFlow](https://stackoverflow.com/a/49443009/9316144)
  - [Persisting User Interface State and Building Bottom Navigation Bars in Dart's Flutter Framework](https://steemit.com/utopian-io/@tensor/persisting-user-interface-state-and-building-bottom-navigation-bars-in-dart-s-flutter-framework)

## BottomNavigation(),

- **** :

  final PageStorageBucket bucket = PageStorageBucket();

  body: PageStorage(
    child: currentPage,
    bucket: bucket,

    identifier: ValueKey(
      '${widget.dataList[index].id}',

Post.title: "setup.py?"
Post._content:
---
> Python,
> **setup.py**,?

# 
- , **`dragon-cli`** , [click](https://click.palletsprojects.com/en/7.x/) () [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kNke39OZ2k0)**setup.py**,,,,, O(_)O~

# 
- , **setup.py**  (Module)/(Package) .`pip`, `easy_install`, ...  (! **setup.py** ).

- **setup.py**,setuptools, `setup(...)` , :

```python
from setuptools import setup

setup(
    # 
    name='foo', 
    # 
    version='1.0',
    #  Python 
    py_modules=['foo'],
    # 
    install_requires=[
        'bar',
    ],
    # ...
)
```


-  (**Python,**)

```bash 
python setup.py install
```

- ,,,,.
  - () **site-packages/** .

- ,,,.


# setup 

> Some values are treated as simple strings, some allow more logic.
>
> Type names used below:
>
> - `str` - simple string
> - `list-comma` - dangling list or string of comma-separated values
> - `list-semi` - dangling list or string of semicolon-separated values
> - `bool` - `True` is 1, yes, true
> - `dict` - list-comma where keys are separated from values by `=`
> - `section` - values are read from a dedicated (sub)section
>
> Special directives:
>
> - `attr:` - Value is read from a module attribute. `attr:` supports callables and iterables; unsupported types are cast using `str()`.
> - `file:` - Value is read from a list of files and then concatenated

-  (MetaData)

|                        |                       |  ()  |           |  |
| :------------------------: | :---------------------------: | :--------------: | :---------------: | :------: |
|                      |             name              |                  |        str        |          |
|                      |            version            |                  | attr:, file:, str |  39.2.0  |
|                  |              url              |    home-page     |        str        |          |
|                            |         download_url          |   download-url   |        str        |          |
|                    |         project_urls          |                  |       dict        |  38.3.0  |
|                        |            author             |                  |        str        |          |
|              |         author_email          |   author-email   |        str        |          |
|                      |          maintainer           |                  |        str        |          |
|            |       maintainer_email        | maintainer-email |        str        |          |
|                |          classifiers          |    classifier    | file:, list-comma |          |
|                    |            license            |                  |        str        |          |
|                            |         license_file          |                  |        str        |          |
|                    |          description          |     summary      |    file:, str     |          |
|                    |       long_description        | long-description |    file:, str     |          |
|                            | long_description_content_type |                  |        str        |  38.6.0  |
|                  |           keywords            |                  |    list-comma     |          |
|          |           platforms           |     platform     |    list-comma     |          |
|  |           provides            |                  |    list-comma     |          |
|            |           requires            |                  |    list-comma     |          |
|                            |           obsoletes           |                  |    list-comma     |          |

- (Option)

|                                                      |                 |                            |
| :------------------------------------------------------: | :---------------------: | :--------------------------------: |
|                            |        zip_safe         |                bool                |
|            setup.py            |     setup_requires      |             list-semi              |
|                                    |    install_requires     |             list-semi              |
|          /           |     extras_require      |              section               |
|                                                          |     python_requires     |                str                 |
|                ==TODO==                |      entry_points       |           file:, section           |
|                                                          |        use_2to3         |                bool                |
|                                                          |     use_2to3_fixers     |             list-comma             |
|                                                          | use_2to3_exclude_fixers |             list-comma             |
|                                                          |  convert_2to3_doctests  |             list-comma             |
|   , PATH     |         scripts         |             list-comma             |
|                                                          |     eager_resources     |             list-comma             |
|                                                          |    dependency_links     |             list-comma             |
|                                                          |      tests_require      |             list-semi              |
|    (cvs/svn/git)     |  include_package_data   |                bool                |
|   (`__init__.py`)    |        packages         | find:, find_namespace:, list-comma |
|                    |       package_dir       |                dict                |
|                                |      package_data       |              section               |
|  include_package_data  True  |  exclude_package_data   |              section               |
|                                                          |   namespace_packages    |             list-comma             |
|                Python                |       py_modules        |             list-comma             |
|                                                          |       data_files        |                dict                |
# 

-  `python setup.py --help-commands` , ()
  -  `python setup.py <COMMAND> --help` 


## :
|                       |                                                                    |
| ------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `python setup.py build`   |  **build/**                              |
| `python setup.py install` |  **build/** () **site-packages/**  |
| `python setup.py clean`   | build                                            |

setup

Some values are treated as simple strings, some allow more logic.

Type names used below:

  • str - simple string
  • list-comma - dangling list or string of comma-separated values
  • list-semi - dangling list or string of semicolon-separated values
  • bool - True is 1, yes, true
  • dict - list-comma where keys are separated from values by =
  • section - values are read from a dedicated (sub)section

Special directives:

  • attr: - Value is read from a module attribute. attr: supports callables and iterables; unsupported types are cast using str().
  • file: - Value is read from a list of files and then concatenated
